text: The 2019 season is Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi's 111th competitive season. ==Season Events== ===New contracts=== On 30 November 2018, Faith Obilor signed a new contract until the end of the 2019 season. On 8 February, Kevin Kouassivi-Benissan signed a new contract until the end of the 2020 season, with an option for an additional year. On 22 February, Nikolai Alho signed a new contract until the end of the 2019 season. On 15 March, Riku Riski signed a new contract until the end of the 2021 season.
